artist: Attributed to Torii Kiyonobu; Published by Igaya Kan'emon
medium: Woodblock print (tan-e); ink on paper with hand-applied color
text: The actors Nakamura Shichisaburō as Chihara Sakonnosuke and Hayakawa Hatsuse as the Courtesan Okuni in the play Shinoda kaikeizan 信田会稽山, performed at the Yamamura Theater in the eighth month of 1702.
title: The Actors Nakamura Shichisaburō as Chihara Sakonnosuke and Hayakawa Hatsuse as the Courtesan Okuni
